title: Pieter Delobelle
subtitle: Hi. I'm a PhD researcher at KU Leuven focussing on alignment and fairness of large language models. I work on both fundamental research and applications of LLMs, with a focus on Dutch.
subtitle_old: Hi. I'm a PhD researcher at KU Leuven working on large language models, specifically Dutch resources (see RobBERT), fairness in NLP and alignment problems with LLMs.
contact: I am often asked for talks and open to collaborations: just contact me on X/Twitter or email me.
RSS_subtitle: My blog about my research on AI, verification and NLP. Currently working at DTAI lab in the KU Leuven.
